description:
Summary:
On screen rotation in Add Beneficiary section the scroll option is not available and the screen is just set to some limited options.

Steps to reproduce:

From Home screen, click on Beneficiaries
Click on Fab option.
Enable screen rotation.
Expected behaviour:
On screen rotation in Add Beneficiary section all the select mode options Add, Scan and Upload QR should be available.

Observed behaviour:
On changing orientation only Add and Scan options are seen on the screen.

Device and Android version:

Vivo 1724
Android 8.1.0
Funtouch OS_4.0
name: Mifos Mobile - Bug Fix: Scroll function is not available on screen rotation
